description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the remote code execution vulnerability in Microsoft WDAC OLE DB provider for SQL Server (CVE-2024-21365), the following updates need to be installed:

1. Download and install the appropriate KB update for your Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 (x64): [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2 (x64): [KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)

2. Restart your system after the installation to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update closes the vulnerability that allows remote code execution, which can be exploited by attackers. Ensuring your system is updated is crucial for maintaining integrity and security.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure you are running one of the specified versions of Windows prior to applying the updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with installations.
